title: 112_hr5844
content: The Act titled "Protecting Victims on Campus Act of 2012" requires disclosure of campus security policy and crime statistics. Section 485(f) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to include making available a list of campus security authorities for reporting criminal offenses, including those involving minors. Paragraph (2) is repealed. The Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to include disclosing campus security authorities for reporting criminal offenses involving minors. This involves designating an individual to oversee campus security authorities and keep victim information confidential. Additionally, paragraph (13) is amended to include distinguishing between institutional neglect and intentional misrepresentation or withholding of information.
